update SCRAPY_CONTENT
DOMIN_ID = #{dominId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CONTENT_COLNUM = #{contentColnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT_URL = #{contentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT_RE_URL = #{contentReUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT_RE_ISFOLLOW = #{contentReIsfollow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CONTENT_HANDLE_FUND = #{contentHandleFund,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CONTENT_ID = #{contentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
